page.title: 06Watford Leisure Centre
page.content: It offers a wide variety of different sports, at present numbering 25. The 2 most popular are squash and badminton. The Centre is open 7 days a week and is used by over 100,000 people each year. The age range of people who use it is from 2 to over 70. The weather affects the number of people who use the Leisure Centre as it limits the use of the outside facilities such as tennis courts. The busiest time at the Centre is from 6.00pm to 10.00pm each evening. It is also very busy in the school holidays when special activities are organised for the children. The Centre has a bar and cafeteria. Annual membership costs 7.00 for an adult and 3.00 for a child if they live in Watford. Users mainly live within a 12 mile radius.
